title: Catching Fire feat. Lilli Cooper & Chuck Cooper
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Broadway stars and father-daughter duo Chuck Cooper ("The Life," "Trouble In Mind") and Lilli Cooper ("Tootsie," "SpongeBob SquarePants") headline this West African adventure tale about using your inner spark to change the world.
